apache.conf.modules

Class StaticModuleParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • apache.conf.modules.ModuleParser
      • apache.conf.modules.StaticModuleParser

  • public class StaticModuleParser
extends ModuleParser

    This class is used to parse and grab Static Modules from the Apache configuration.

    Static Modules are compiled into Apache.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StaticModuleParser(File binFile)
      StaticModuleParser constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StaticModule[] getStaticModules()
      Gets a list of all statically loaded modules.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StaticModuleParser

        public StaticModuleParser(File binFile)
                   throws java.lang.Exception

        StaticModuleParser constructor. A valid Apache binary file must be specified. Modules are obtained by running the binary file with the -M option.

        Example: "/usr/local/apache/bin/apachectl -M"
        /usr/local/apache/bin/apachectl would be the binary file in this case.

        Parameters:
        binFile - An Apache binary file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the specified binFile does not exist.

    • Method Detail

      • getStaticModules

        public StaticModule[] getStaticModules()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets a list of all statically loaded modules. These modules can never change so it is recommended that the result of this function be cached whenever possible.
        Returns:
        an array of all Static Modules.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is an error obtaining modules
